Nightmare start continues for Marcus Smart and the Grizzlies.

Up 10 with 3:00 left and up 7 with 1:32 left, Memphis loses in overtime at Portland (24-7-10 for Malcolm Brogdon).

The Grizzlies (5th best record in the NBA last year) are 0-6.

With the Mavericks loss Friday night in Denver, the Celtics are the last unbeaten team in the NBA.

1. BOSTON 4-0
2. Denver 5-1
     Golden State 5-1
4. Dallas 4-1
     New Orleans 4-1
6. Philadelphia 3-1

Celtics open a 3-game trip in Brooklyn tonight.
